The Forger (2012)

Dutch
Joshua (Josh Hutcherson) is een 15-jarig wonderkind en werd ooit in de steek
gelaten door zijn verslaafde moeder. Hij woont in Carmel-by-the-Sea, een klein
stadje in het noorden van CaliforniÃƒÂ«, dat bekend staat om haar lokale

Englisch
Joshua, a teenager with a drugged-out mother on the run, wanders into the affluent
community of Carmel, California. After getting himself into trouble, the
authorities try to track down his mother. But in the meantime, a successful
artist/businessman offers to take in Joshua and let him have a chance at a good life.
His motives are questionable considering his line of business and how he plans to use
Joshua's artistic talents, but Joshua has met a girl and he's not sure if the money
is worth selling off his morals.
